price: So he left the city, fearful and vigilant. He said, “My Lord, save me from the wrongdoing people.”
arabic: فَخَرَجَ مِنۡهَا خَآئِفٗا يَتَرَقَّبُۖ قَالَ رَبِّ نَجِّنِي مِنَ ٱلۡقَوۡمِ ٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
